name: Rocks And Ghosts ACE
description:
I was surprised when understand that one great computer Jupiter Ace haven't your own Rocks'n'Diamonds game.

With writing this game I began to get acquainted with this small but cool computer.

I've developed and tested it with Minstrel 4th kit and ZesaruX emulator. 

It should work fine on any jupiter ace and clone with 16Kb or more ram. 

If you really like this game - please leave some feedback about it - and I'll make new version - with larger sprites, screen scrolling and implement more mechanics.
